name: Unslider Image
author: pashabd

sections.description:
This plugin will enable a image slider in your wordpress theme. You can embed unslider image via shortcode in everywhere you want, even in theme files.

Wanna see how it works? Click here: http://pashabd.com/plugins/unslider-image-page/
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload plugin-directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Use shortcode in page, post or in widgets.
  4. If you want unslider image in your theme php, Place <?php echo do_shortcode('YOUR_SHORTCODE'); ?> in your templates

Shortcodes

General slider

[image_slider]

Slider for five post

[image_slider count="5" ]
sections.faq:
How do I install this plugin?

You can install as others regular wordpress plugin. No different way. Please see on installation tab.

Why this plugin doesn’t support custom image in slider?

If you need custom image support in slider, you have to purchase premium version. Premium version is coming soon. Please wait for that.

short_description: Unslider image is an awesome, super lightweight slider plugin for your wordpress website.
